reviewText: was not compatible with my computer because I needed to use a convertor so it was waste of money

I ordered the correct format for the US and my DVD player could not read it. Stay clear of this video unless you want to waste your money. The video ships from outside the US and it took 3 weeks to get here and then it didn't work. It's not worth sending it back. Amazon, you shouldn't let this happen to your customers. More care is needed to ensure US customers get products suitable for our market.

I now have 5 of Louise Solomon's Yogalates DVD's and I love all of them.  I rotate to have a different routine.  I just love the way I feel when I have finished a workout.
Just be careful when ordering, that you get the American DVD.  I ordered 2 that were UK and had to convert them in order to play them on my DVD player.
